thread.title: Former detective gets probation for misuse of public funds
thread.title_full: Former detective gets probation for misuse of public funds - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Former detective gets probation for misuse of public funds
text: SALT LAKE CITY (AP) - A former Unified Police detective has been sentenced to two years of probation and ordered to pay restitution in connection to $8,500 he could not account for. The Deseret News reports (http://bit.ly/1Vu1fXn ) that 49-year-old Kenneth Callahan pleaded guilty in August to a reduced charge ... ...
